subtitle: born in Anne Arundel County, Maryland, 1680, died in Prince George's County, Maryland, 1761.
series: Historical papers of the Society of Colonial Wars in the District of Columbia,
title: Colonel Joseph Belt
by_statement: A paper read before the Society of Colonial Wars in the District of Columbia, March 25, 1909, the two hundred and seventy-fifth anniversary of the landing of the Ark and the Dove on the shores of St. Mary's County, Maryland, by Caleb Clarke Magruder, Jr.
